Text:
I would imagine its a DVD about Killer Tigers that live near a Swamp.

Are you stupid ?

For those of you unable to Google, here's a summary:

Run time approx. 50 mins

This enthralling film brings you face to face with the beautiful, yet terrifying, man - eating tigers that stalk the mangrove swamps of the the Bay of Bengal, striking fear into the heart of every living being!

This footage gives  a fascinating glimpse into the private lives of two tiger families - bringing you so close you'll hardly dare breathe!

Please note some scenes may not be recommended for viewing by young children.
[Presumably the scenes where the tigers rip ther prey limb from limb and swallow the warm bloody flesh.]

Hmm really??

Man eating a tiger in the swamps of Bengal ?? :))

must be a comedy then ;)

Anyway thx for
